main event: Observers watched a bright white light in the eastern sky that appeared to separate into two parts and then recombine, lasting for 45 minutes.
interesting points: The object faded and increased in brightness rapidly., There was no radar contact made with the object., The sighting involved one confirmed witness., The weather was clear during the observation., The object's course was towards the North-Northwest.
witness description: The witness reported the sighting and provided details in a questionnaire format.
